basics.name: Artem Skripka
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Young and highly motivated software engineer. I'm experienced in building modern web apps with Ruby on Rails and React and have more than 2 years experience in web-development and more than 6 years in IT. Also I am interested with good software design and functional programming.

work.summary: Working at LearnTrials project - an edTech startup helping to expand an equitable access for all students to education technology that works.
highlights: Rewrite parts of legacy Angular frontend into new shiny React during implementation of new features.
Implement new features for RoR backend / React frontend.

work.summary: GridHub is a renewable energy business platform helping clients showcase their portfolio and expertise. I worked as a fullstack engineer, participated in building application infrastructure.
highlights: I learned to stop worrying and love tests
Led the process of making a step out of typical RailsWay and use Trailblazer and Dry-stack in production

work.summary: The company focused on partnership with building companies, helping them get more control at their business processes with a help of ERP systems based on products of 1C company. I participated in 4 integration projects lasting from 4 to 13 months.
highlights: Wrote several instructions for ERP system
Taught dozens of customer's employees to work in new business processes
Led for one developer and one consultant during ERP integration
Made a platform for internal use based on both 1C Document Management and 1C ITIL
